title: Ticket #3975: 8.1.2 condorc van windows failure to transfer executable
description:
condor_ab_van fails on windows.

Failure to send executable for job 

10/09/13 19:22:18 (pid:49784) entering FileTransfer::SimpleInit
10/09/13 19:22:18 (pid:49784) perm::init() starting up for account (bt) domain (btthinkpad)

remarks:
2013-Oct-10 15:05:40 by ziliang:
I think I fixed this with #3979.

2013-Oct-16 14:23:36 by johnkn:
This bug is fixed by a commit in #3589. note that this bug never shipped.

2013-Oct-18 12:11:02 by tannenba:
TJ, you say "fixed by a commit"... which commit? Also, you resolved this ticket saying it is fixed in v8.0.x, but all the commits in the ticket you reference are in v8.1.x, so how can this bug possibly be resolved in v8.0.x ?

Please correct the comments and meta-information in this ticket.
check_ins: 2013-Oct-09 15:31   Check-in [37805]: Fix GetJobExecutable() for Windows full pathnames. #3589 Use fullpath(), which has a better check for whether a filename is an absolute path. this fixes #3975 (By Jaime Frey )
creator: bt
